paper_abstract: Starting from the idea of activity orders, we define a family of orders on the set of closed intervals of a distributive lattice L, that will allow us to set up some preorders associated to the ambiguity and fuzziness in order to measure the ambiguity and fuzziness degree of any closed interval in [0, 1]. (c) 2006 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Ambiguity and fuzziness measures defined on the set of closed intervals in [0,1]
